text: eninum (napiye!) Avarkal purakkanittu vittal (nir kavalaiyuratir); nam um'mai avarkal mitu patukavalaraka anuppavillai (tutuc ceytiyai etuttuk kuri) ettivaippatu tan um'mitu katamaiyakum; innum, niccayamaka nam'mutaiya rahmattai - nallarulai manitarkal cuvaikkumpatic ceytal, atu kantu avarkal makilkirarkal; anal avarkalutaiya kaikal murpatuttiyulla (pavattina karanat)tal avarkalukkut tinku nerittal - niccayamaka manitan nanri kettu maru ceypavanaka irukkinran
